mapper.select: SELECT ot.t_id,DATE_FORMAT(ot.t_date,'%Y-%c-%d')as gm_date,ot.order_no,ot.t_studios_name,DATE_FORMAT(ot.t_timetable,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s')as bf_date ,ot.t_cinema_hall,ot.t_seat,ot.t_num,ot.t_price,mi.movie_name,img.mi_path from order_ticket ot LEFT JOIN movie_info mi on ot.movie_id=mi.movie_id LEFT JOIN movie_image img on mi.movie_id=img.mi_movie_id where ot.user_uuid=${uId}
